verses.esv:
6   Train up a child in the way he should go;
    even when he is old he will not depart from it.
verses.kjv: 6 Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
verses.niv: 6 Train a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not turn from it.

verses.esv: 4 Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
verses.kjv: 4 And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
verses.niv: 4 Fathers, do not exasperate your children; instead, bring them up in the training and instruction of the Lord.

verses.esv:
3   Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD,
    the fruit of the womb a reward.
4   Like arrows in the hand of a warrior
    are the children of one’s youth.
5   Blessed is the man
    who fills his quiver with them!
  He shall not be put to shame
    when he speaks with his enemies in the gate.
verses.kjv: 3 Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward. 4 As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth. 5 Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
verses.niv: 3 Sons are a heritage from the LORD, children a reward from him. 4 Like arrows in the hands of a warrior are sons born in one's youth. 5 Blessed is the man whose quiver is full of them. They will not be put to shame when they contend with their enemies in the gate.

verses.esv:
6   Grandchildren are the crown of the aged,
    and the glory of children is their fathers.
verses.kjv: 6 Children’s children are the crown of old men; and the glory of children are their fathers.
verses.niv: 6 Children's children are a crown to the aged, and parents are the pride of their children.

verses.esv: 12 Let no one despise you for your youth, but set the believers an example in speech, in conduct, in love, in faith, in purity.
verses.kjv: 12 Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.
verses.niv: 12 Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers in speech, in life, in love, in faith and in purity.

verses.esv:
3   Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD,
    the fruit of the womb a reward.
verses.kjv: 3 Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
verses.niv: 3 Sons are a heritage from the LORD, children a reward from him.

verses.esv: 10 “See that you do not despise one of these little ones. For I tell you that in heaven their angels always see the face of my Father who is in heaven.
verses.kjv: 10 Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones; for I say unto you, That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven.
verses.niv: 10 "See that you do not look down on one of these little ones. For I tell you that their angels in heaven always see the face of my Father in heaven.

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 21 When a woman is giving birth, she has sorrow because her hour has come, but when she has delivered the baby, she no longer remembers the anguish, for joy that a human being has been born into the world.
verses.kjv: 21 A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.
verses.niv: 21 A woman giving birth to a child has pain because her time has come; but when her baby is born she forgets the anguish because of her joy that a child is born into the world.

verses.esv: 20 Children, obey your parents in everything, for this pleases the Lord.
verses.kjv: 20 Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
verses.niv: 20 Children, obey your parents in everything, for this pleases the Lord.

verses.esv: 26 for in Christ Jesus you are all sons of God, through faith.
verses.kjv: 26 For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 26 You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv:
13   All your children shall be taught by the LORD,
    and great shall be the peace of your children.
verses.kjv: 13 And all thy children shall be taught of the LORD; and great shall be the peace of thy children.
verses.niv: 13 All your sons will be taught by the LORD, and great will be your children's peace.

verses.esv:
24   Whoever spares the rod hates his son,
    but he who loves him is diligent to discipline him.
verses.kjv: 24 He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.
verses.niv: 24 He who spares the rod hates his son, but he who loves him is careful to discipline him.

verses.esv:
9   He gives the barren woman a home,
    making her the joyous mother of children.
  Praise the LORD!
verses.kjv: 9 He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.niv: 9 He settles the barren woman in her home as a happy mother of children. Praise the LORD.

verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv: 14 For all who are led by the Spirit of God are sons of God.
verses.kjv: 14 For as many as are led by the Spirit of God, they are the sons of God.
verses.niv: 14 because those who are led by the Spirit of God are sons of God.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv: 16 The Spirit himself bears witness with our spirit that we are children of God,
verses.kjv: 16 The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:
verses.niv: 16 The Spirit himself testifies with our spirit that we are God's children.

verses.esv: 9 “Blessed are the peacemakers, for they shall be called sons of God.
verses.kjv: 9 Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
verses.niv: 9 Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called sons of God.

verses.esv:
15   Folly is bound up in the heart of a child,
    but the rod of discipline drives it far from him.
verses.kjv: 15 Foolishness is bound in the heart of a child; but the rod of correction shall drive it far from him.
verses.niv: 15 Folly is bound up in the heart of a child, but the rod of discipline will drive it far from him.

verses.esv: 7 You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, and when you walk by the way, and when you lie down, and when you rise.
verses.kjv: 7 And thou shalt teach them diligently unto thy children, and shalt talk of them when thou sittest in thine house, and when thou walkest by the way, and when thou liest down, and when thou risest up.
verses.niv: 7 Impress them on your children. Talk about them when you sit at home and when you walk along the road, when you lie down and when you get up.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 6:1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right. 2 “Honor your father and mother” (this is the first commandment with a promise), 3 “that it may go well with you and that you may live long in the land.” 4 Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
verses.kjv: 1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right. 2 Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;) 3 That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth. 4 And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
verses.niv: 1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right. 2 "Honor your father and mother"--which is the first commandment with a promise-- 3 "that it may go well with you and that you may enjoy long life on the earth." 4 Fathers, do not exasperate your children; instead, bring them up in the training and instruction of the Lord.

verses.esv: 32 Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
verses.kjv: 32 And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ’s sake hath forgiven you.
verses.niv: 32 Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

verses.esv: 8 but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.kjv: 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.niv: 8 But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
